description: Deletes the specified slot from an intent.

parameters.name: slotId
parameters.description: The identifier of the slot to delete.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot associated with the slot to delete.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot associated with the slot to delete.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale that the slot will be deleted from. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

parameters.name: intentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the intent associated with the slot.
